Uses of Class
ml.alternet.security.auth.hashers.impl.HasherBase

  • Packages that use HasherBase 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.security.auth.formats
    Common built-in crypt formats and algorithms used to retrieve concrete hashers.
    ml.alternet.security.auth.hashers.impl
    Concrete hashers.

    • Uses of HasherBase in ml.alternet.security.auth.formats

      Subclasses of HasherBase in ml.alternet.security.auth.formats 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PlainTextCryptFormat.PlainTextHasher
      Just encode the chars with the charset supplied without hashing ; DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION.

    • Uses of HasherBase in ml.alternet.security.auth.hashers.impl

      Subclasses of HasherBase in ml.alternet.security.auth.hashers.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BCryptHasher
      The BCrypt hasher.
      class  MD5BasedHasher
      The MD5 based BSD password algorithm 1 and apr1 (Apache variant).
      class  MessageHasher
      The hasher is based on Java's message digests.
      class  PBKDF2Hasher
      A slightly modified PBKDF2 hasher, that erase intermediate data.
      class  SaltedMessageHasher
      Compute a checksum as the raw digest of the the string {password}{salt}.
      class  SHA2Hasher
      The SHA-256/512 hash algorithms in a libc6 crypt() compatible way.
      class  UnixCryptHasher
      The Unix Crypt hasher.
